text:
I'm optimistic about the direction 👇 is going, but it's still uncertain

With all the pt. in #ICU, 'Compassionate Use' is no-brainer. With lack of #PPE, trial for #hcw + 'close contact' worthy IMO

Still need 💊full production💊 up front *in case* it works #COVID19 #Chloroquine https://t.co/j9iNcMcwhc
